raw: * All widget used as scrollbars must implement this interface.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: All widget used as scrollbars must implement this interface.

raw: * Fired if the user scroll
* Fired as soon as the scroll animation ended.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired as soon as the scroll animation ended.

raw: * The scroll bar orientation
* The maximum value (difference between available size and
* content size).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The maximum value (difference between available size and content size).

raw: * Position of the scrollbar (which means the scroll left/top of the
* attached area's pane)
* Strictly validates according to {@link #maximum}.
* Does not apply any correction to the incoming value. If you depend
* on this, please use {@link #scrollTo} instead.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Position of the scrollbar (which means the scroll left/top of the attached area's pane) Strictly validates according to {@link #maximum}. Does not apply any correction to the incoming value. If you depend on this, please use {@link #scrollTo} instead.

raw: * Factor to apply to the width/height of the knob in relation
* to the dimension of the underlying area.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Factor to apply to the width/height of the knob in relation to the dimension of the underlying area.

raw: * Scrolls to the given position.
* This method automatically corrects the given position to respect
* the {@link #maximum}.
* @param position {Integer} Scroll to this position. Must be greater zero.
* @param duration {Number} The time in milliseconds the slide to should take.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Scrolls to the given position. This method automatically corrects the given position to respect the {@link #maximum}.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: position {Integer} Scroll to this position. Must be greater zero.
@param.description: Scroll to this position. Must be greater zero.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: duration {Number} The time in milliseconds the slide to should take.
@param.description: The time in milliseconds the slide to should take.

raw: * Scrolls by the given offset.
* This method automatically corrects the given position to respect
* the {@link #maximum}.
* @param offset {Integer} Scroll by this offset
* @param duration {Number} The time in milliseconds the slide to should take.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Scrolls by the given offset. This method automatically corrects the given position to respect the {@link #maximum}.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: duration {Number} The time in milliseconds the slide to should take.
@param.description: The time in milliseconds the slide to should take.

raw: * Scrolls by the given number of steps.
* This method automatically corrects the given position to respect
* the {@link #maximum}.
* @param steps {Integer} Number of steps
* @param duration {Number} The time in milliseconds the slide to should take.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Scrolls by the given number of steps. This method automatically corrects the given position to respect the {@link #maximum}.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: duration {Number} The time in milliseconds the slide to should take.
@param.description: The time in milliseconds the slide to should take.
